member.name: T:DotNetNuke.Modules.Blog.BlogPost
member.history: [pdonker] 12/21/2009 added passing in of blog settings to all methods that go to the provider. Added _TabId variable. [pdonker] 02/03/2013 complete overhaul with removal of old duplicate code layer. New security pattern to make this more solid and allow for ghost writing.

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Modules.Blog.BlogPost.getPostCategories(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.remarks: We do not handle tags in here, handled in provider. Likewise, provider 'retrieval' doesn't handle categories.

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Modules.Blog.BlogPost.newPost(System.String,System.String,System.String,DotNetNuke.Modules.Blog.Services.WLW.MetaWeblog.Post,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new post. The publish boolean is used to determine whether the item should be published or not.

members.member:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Fill hydrates the object from a Datareader
The Fill method is used by the CBO method to hydrtae the object rather than using the more expensive Refection methods.
[pdonker] 05/23/2013 Created

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Gets and sets the Key ID
The KeyID property is part of the IHydratble interface. It is used as the key property when creating a Dictionary
[pdonker] 05/23/2013 Created

member.summary: Deletes a journal item associated with the specified blog Post.

member.summary: Deletes a journal item associated with the specific comment.

member.summary: This method will send a core notification to blog owners when a blog Post is pending publishing approval.

member.summary: Removes any notifications associated w/ a specific blog Post pending approval.

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Modules.Blog.Integration.NotificationController.AddNotificationTypes
member.summary: This will create a notification type associated w/ the module and also handle the actions that must be associated with it.
member.remarks: This should only ever run once, during 5.0.0 install (via IUpgradeable)

member.summary: Interface for MetaWeblog methods that WLW uses

member.name: T:DotNetNuke.Modules.Blog.Services.WLW.MetaWeblog.Post
member.summary: Central structure to pass a post between WLW and the module

member.name: F:DotNetNuke.Modules.Blog.Services.WLW.MetaWeblog.Post.pubDate
member.summary: The date to publish the blog Post.

member.name: F:DotNetNuke.Modules.Blog.Services.WLW.MetaWeblog.Post.date_created_gmt
member.summary: The GMT DateTime value when the blog Post was created.

member.name: F:DotNetNuke.Modules.Blog.Services.WLW.MetaWeblog.Post.dateCreated
member.summary: The DateTime value when the blog Post was created.

member.name: F:DotNetNuke.Modules.Blog.Services.WLW.MetaWeblog.Post.categories
member.summary: List of categories for the post

member.name: F:DotNetNuke.Modules.Blog.Services.WLW.MetaWeblog.Post.wp_slug
member.summary: Used to track an SEO friendly description of the post, usually shorter than the Title and formatted for SEO presentation (eg. Using-Trackbacks-1). Only utilized if the supportsSlug entity is set to yes in the manifest file.

member.name: F:DotNetNuke.Modules.Blog.Services.WLW.MetaWeblog.Post.wp_password
member.summary: Only utilized if the supportsPassword entity is set to yes in the manifest file.

member.name: F:DotNetNuke.Modules.Blog.Services.WLW.MetaWeblog.Post.wp_page_parent_id
member.summary: Only utilized if the supportsPageParent entity is set to yes in the manifest file.

member.name: F:DotNetNuke.Modules.Blog.Services.WLW.MetaWeblog.Post.wp_page_order
member.summary: Only utilized if the supportsPageOrder entity is set to yes in the manifest file.

member.name: F:DotNetNuke.Modules.Blog.Services.WLW.MetaWeblog.Post.wp_author_id
member.summary: Only utilized if the supportsAuthor entity is set to yes in the manifest file.

member.name: F:DotNetNuke.Modules.Blog.Services.WLW.MetaWeblog.Post.mt_excerpt
member.summary: Only utilized if the supportsExcerpt entity is set to yes in the manifest file. In plain HTML.

member.name: F:DotNetNuke.Modules.Blog.Services.WLW.MetaWeblog.Post.mt_text_more
member.summary: Only utilized if the supportsExtendedPosts entity is set to yes in the manifest file.

member.name: F:DotNetNuke.Modules.Blog.Services.WLW.MetaWeblog.Post.mt_tb_ping_urls
member.summary: Used to manage trackback URLs. Will only be populated if supportsTrackbacks is set to yes in the manifest file.

member.name: F:DotNetNuke.Modules.Blog.Services.WLW.MetaWeblog.Post.page_status
member.summary: Used to track the status of the page. This is a WordPress property.

member.summary: returns cacheability of the passed text regarding all contained tokens

member.remarks: always check cacheability before caching a module!

member.name: T:DotNetNuke.Modules.Blog.Templating.BaseTokenReplace
member.summary: The BaseTokenReplace class provides the tokenization of tokens formatted [object:property] or [object:property|format|ifEmpty] or [custom:no] within a string with the appropriate current property/custom values.

member.name: P:DotNetNuke.Modules.Blog.Templating.BaseTokenReplace.TokenizerRegex
member.summary: Gets the Regular expression for the token to be replaced

member.name: P:DotNetNuke.Modules.Blog.Templating.BaseTokenReplace.Language
member.summary: Gets/sets the language to be used, e.g. for date format

member.name: P:DotNetNuke.Modules.Blog.Templating.BaseTokenReplace.FormatProvider
member.summary: Gets the Format provider as Culture info from stored language or current culture

member.name: T:DotNetNuke.Modules.Blog.Templating.TokenReplace
member.summary: The TokenReplace class provides the option to replace tokens formatted [object:property] or [object:property|format] or [custom:no] within a string with the appropriate current property/custom values. Example for Newsletter: 'Dear [user:Displayname],' ==> 'Dear Superuser Account,' Supported Token Sources: User, Host, Portal, Tab, Module, Membership, Profile, Row, Date, Ticks, ArrayList (Custom), IDictionary

member.name: P:DotNetNuke.Modules.Blog.Templating.TokenReplace.HostSettings
member.summary: Gets the Host settings from Portal

member.name: P:DotNetNuke.Modules.Blog.Templating.TokenReplace.ModuleId
member.summary: Gets/sets the current ModuleID to be used for 'User:' token replacement

member.name: P:DotNetNuke.Modules.Blog.Templating.TokenReplace.ModuleInfo
member.summary: Gets/sets the module settings object to use for 'Module:' token replacement

member.name: P:DotNetNuke.Modules.Blog.Templating.TokenReplace.PortalSettings
member.summary: Gets/sets the portal settings object to use for 'Portal:' token replacement

member.name: P:DotNetNuke.Modules.Blog.Templating.TokenReplace.User
member.summary: Gets/sets the user object to use for 'User:' token replacement
